'''''Journey to the Mysterious Island''''' is the third act of the [[Tribal Chronicles]] [[Where the Springs Return]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player must have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 40, and have completed the {{Quest|Into Eternal Night}}.
